attributes.action: ask the data protection commissioner to review the HMRC's data protection proceedure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hello,

as one of the 15.5 million children affected by the HMRC's lasted information mishap casued by as you know a juinor civil servent posting disks containing my and other child's details(inculding your childrens)to the NAO but managing to lose both disks containing the information i feel that i and the other 24 million people affected have the right to ask the data protection commissioner to review all data protection proceedures used by the HMRC.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
